Bertha Sophie Felicitas Freifrau von Suttner (nke a na-akpọ ; nke a na-amụ   und Tettau; 9 June 1843 n'ụbọchị 21 June 1914) bụ onye Austria-Bohemian na-eme udo na onye edemede
N'afọ 1905, ọ ghọrọ nwanyị nke abụọ nwetara ihe nrite Nobel (mgbe Marie Curie gasịrị n'afọ 1903), nwanyị mbụ e nyere ihe nrite udo Nobel, na onye Austria mbụ nwetara ihe nritu Nobel.

A mụrụ Bertha Kinský n'ụbọchị 9 June 1843 na Kinský Palace na Obecní dvůr (cz) district nke Prague. Nne na nna ya bụ Austrian Lieutenant general (German: Feldmarschall-Leutnant) Franz Michael de Paula Josef Graf Kinsky von Wchinitz und Tettau (1769 ruo afọ 1843), onye nwụrụ n'oge na-adịbeghị anya mgbe ọ dị afọ 75, na nwunye ya na-eto eto Sophie Wilhelmine von Körner (1815 ruo afọ 1884),  fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri ise karịa ya.

Ọ bụ ezie na mmekọrịta onwe onye ya na Alfred Nobel dị mkpirikpi, ya na ya na-ederịta akwụkwọ ozi ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na 1896, a kwenyere na Von Suttner nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu na mkpebi ya itinye ihe nrite udo n'etiti ihe nrite ndị ahụ enyere na testament ya

E nyere Bertha von Suttner Nobel Peace Price na nke ise na 10 Disemba 1905, ya na onye ibe ya, onye ọkà mmụta iwu Tobias Asser (1838-1913) maka enyemaka ha n'ịmepụta usoro mba ụwa dabere na udo karịa agha
Ihe ngosi ahụ mere na 18 Eprel 1906 na Kristiania.
